About Janice

With over 20 years of experience in the beauty industry, Janice prides herself on an expansive skill set. Hair and make up is just the beginning. From correction work, to hair extensions and wigs. She also does fantasy updos. Nothing is out of her realm. Janice has worked on films, local plays , music videos, photo shoots and TV. She also freelances her work out of salon doing onsite work such as weddings or other functions.

Services

Janice provides vegan and environmentally friendly products. She respects and celebrates the diversity of all her clients. As such, her pricing scale is neutral.​

-Consultations are always free-

  • Haircuts $25-$60

    Short and easy to long and styled

  • Hair Colour $40-S60

    Just roots to whole head

  • Highlights Partial to Full $45-$120

    Ombre, balliage and cap or foil or freehand hilites

  • Updos and Speciality Hair $50 an hour

    Whether for a wedding , party , film shoot or otherwise.

  • Extensions $10-$350

    Pieces of flash to half heads to whole head

Visiting Janice over the years has become a kind of therapy. I always leave her chair looking, and feeling great.
I've been a client of Janice's for over a decade and would never dream of going anywhere else!
Always open to a challenge and always learning, Janice has excelled at any style I have thrown at her.
Been going to Janice for over 10 years now! Fun, professional, creative and kind. I always get asked who does my hair!
